Discover 3 of Catalonia's most iconic wineries with your local guide in the Penedes Wine Region! Learn how different varieties of wine are produced and have the opportunity to taste them! First we will visit the award-winning Bodegues Jean Leon in central Penedes where we will do two wine tastings. Then head to Bodegues Torres to learn more about wine production, followed by a wine tasting of three wines, as well as three local cheeses. Finally, visit Caves Freixenet learning about the process of making cava. You’ll sample two cavas with delicious tapas.
